In Terraria, every world is unique -- from the floating islands in the sky to the deepest level of The Underworld. Adventure to the ends of the earth, and battle villainous bosses along the way. The world is your canvas and action-packed, sandbox adventures are just a pickaxe swing away!

Every pixel of Terraria has been crafted for the BEST possible mobile experience!

Greetings Terrarians! Thank you as always for your ongoing and enthusiastic support. We are excited to bring you the latest in our string of updates focused on solidifying the core game experience. 
This update includes additional Local and Cloud save slots for Characters and Worlds as well as the functionality to back-up your saves! More info at 
 
http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/expanded-save-slots-backup-function-is-here-for-ios-and-google-play.44852/
